The plot of "Tracker" revolves around an American tracker named John (Jed Brophy), who searches for lost people and has been hired by wealthy businessman Louis Creed (Richard Schiff)) to find his missing son, Grant Creed (Hugh Laurie)), who disappeared while on the set of a horror film directed by Grant Creed himself. John's search leads him to various locations around the world, including the United States of America, Canada, Mexico, China, Japan, Korea, Australia, New Zealand, and Europe.
As John continues his search for Grant Creed, he becomes increasingly frustrated and determined to find him at all costs. Along the way, John encounters various obstacles, including dangerous wildlife, hostile locals, treacherous terrain, limited resources, and tight deadlines. Despite these challenges, John remains steadfast in his determination to find Grant Creed at all costs.

Based on the user's preference cues and genre information, here are some potential recommendations:

1. Flash Gordon (1980)):
This classic adventure film is set in the distant future, where Earth has been colonized by humans from different planets. The main protagonist of the film is a young astronaut named Gordon, who is assigned to a mission to explore the outer space and search for habitable planets.
The film follows Gordon's journey through space as he encounters various challenges and obstacles along his way. Along his journey, Gordon also forms a close bond with another astronaut named Arden, who also joins Gordon on his journey through space.
The film culminates in an epic battle between Gordon and a group of rogue alien soldiers led by the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciless.
In the end, Gordon manages to defeat the group of rogue alien soldiers led by the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciful, and ultimately saves Earth from the evil schemes of the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciful.
Overall, Flash Gordon (1980)) is an enjoyable and entertaining adventure film that explores various themes and ideas related to space exploration, science fiction, and adventure storytelling.

2. Tropic Thunder (2008)):
This comedy film is set in the present day, where a group of actors are on location at an exotic tropical rainforest located deep in the Amazon Basin.
The main protagonist of the film is an experienced actor named Ben Stiller, who is cast as the lead role of the adventure film being made by the group of actors.
The film follows Ben Stiller's journey through space as he encounters various challenges and obstacles along his way. Along his journey, Ben Stiller also forms a close bond with another experienced actor named Robert Downey Jr., who is cast in a supporting role alongside Ben Stiller.
The film culminates in an epic battle between Ben Stiller and a group of rogue alien soldiers led by the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciless.
In the end, Ben Stiller manages to defeat the group of rogue alien soldiers led by the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciful, and ultimately saves Earth from the evil schemes of the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciful.
Overall, Tropic Thunder (2008)) is an enjoyable and entertaining comedy film that explores various themes and ideas related to space exploration, science fiction, and comedy storytelling.

3. Thor: The Dark World (2013)):
This action-adventure film is set in the present day, where a group of superheroes are on location at an exotic tropical rainforest located deep in the Amazon Basin.
The main protagonist of the film is the superhero named Thor, who is cast as the lead role of the adventure film being made by the group of superheroes.
The film follows Thor's journey through space as he encounters various challenges and obstacles along his way. Along his journey, Thor also forms a close bond with another experienced superhero named Bruce Banner (portrayed by Eric Schmidt), who is cast in a supporting role alongside Thor.
The film culminates in an epic battle between Thor and a group of rogue alien soldiers led by the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciless.
In the end, Thor manages to defeat the group of rogue alien soldiers led by the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciful, and ultimately saves Earth from the evil schemes of the evil alien Emperor Ming the Merciful.
Overall, Thor: The Dark World (2013)) is an enjoyable and entertaining action-adventure film that explores various themes and ideas related to space exploration, science fiction, and adventure storytelling.
